content: chain from hook increase chain 1 turn 4 round 2 increase single_crochet x2 increase chain 1 turn 6 round 3-4 single_crochet x6 chain 1 turn 6 round 5 increase single_crochet x4 increase chain 1 turn 8 top under chin round 6-7 single_crochet x8 chain 1 turn 8 round 8 single_crochet x3 increase single_crochet 4 chain 1 turn 9 round 9-12 single_crochet x9 chain 1 turn 9 round 13 decrease single_crochet x5 decrease chain 1 turn 7 round 14 single_crochet x3 decrease single_crochet x2 chain 1 turn 6 round 15-16 single_crochet x6 chain 1 turn 6 round 17 decrease single_crochet x2 decrease chain 1 turn 4 round 18 single_crochet x4 4 round 19 single_crochet around edge of entire belly spacing evenly and using 2-3 single_crochet in the corners finish off with slip_stitch leave ~20-25 tail for sewing the side with the tail will be the edge above the feet but you can flip it the other way if you like the look better arms make 2 yarn a brown round 1 make a magic_ring single_crochet x6 6 round 2 increase repeat around 12 round 3-4 single_crochet x12 12 legs round 5 single_crochet x4 decrease repeat around 10 round 6 single_crochet x10 10 round 7 decrease single_crochet x8 9 round 8-11 single_crochet x9 9 round 12 increase single_crochet x2 repeat around 12 round 13 fold in half and crochet through both sides to close before closing you can feet very lightly stuff arms if you wish single_crochet x6 6 finish off with slip_stitch and leave ~7-8 tail to sew legs make 2 yarn a brown round 1 make a magic_ring single_crochet x5 5 round 2 increase repeat around 10 round 3 single_crochet increase repeat around 15 round 4 single_crochet x2 increase repeat around 20 round 5-6 single_crochet x20 20 round 7 single_crochet x3 increase repeat around 25 arms round 8 single_crochet x25 25 round 9 decrease single_crochet x3 repeat around 20 back of tail front of tail side that attaches to body round 10 decrease x2 single_crochet x6 x2 16 round 11 decrease single_crochet x5 x2 14 round 12 decrease single_crochet x5 x2 12 round 13 single_crochet x12 12 finish off with slip_stitch leave ~20-25 tail for sewing 9 front fl row skipped feet make 2 yarn a brown round 1 make a magic_ring single_crochet x5 9 round 2 increase single_crochet x2 increase 8 1 row of chain 5 skip 1 st repeats on back of tail 7 round 3 single_crochet x8 8 round 4 single_crochet x3 increase repeat around 10 5 round 5-7 single_crochet x10 10 stuff with polyfill which should only fill about ½ 3 to 2/3 of the foot 1 round 8 decrease x2 single_crochet x6 8 round 9 single_crochet x8 8 round 10 decrease single_crochet x6 7 round 11 single_crochet x7 7 finish off with slip_stitch and sew closed weave in tail back of tail 10 fl row completed tail yarn a brown round 1 chain 6 starting from 2nd chain from hook single_crochet x4 and continue on
